software.name: proquiz
ProQuiz
software.describtion: ProQuiz V2 is a Professional Quiz Maker Software capable of Generating Quizzes of all types by simple user interface. Its easy User-friendly interface makes it stand apart from other softwares in this category.

features.feature: Admin Customization of Anti-Hack Features Added
Onevent of Hack Users Record May be Deleted
Onevent of Hack Users Account may be Deactivated
User Delete Feature added to Admin Panel
Automatic Update Notification Added to Admin Panel

bugfixes.bugs: Bug Fix in Setup Quiz Page.
